Welcome to Juham‚Ñ¢ - Juha's Ultimate Home Automation Core

Description
-----------

``juham-core`` extends the functionality of ``Masterpiece`` object by adding capabilities for MQTT
communication and integration with time series databases. The base class provides only a minimal
set of interfaces. Actual features, such as MQTT and time series database implementations ‚Äî along with home
automation-specific functionalities ‚Äî are provided through separate plugin modules built on ``juham-core`` class.


Project Status and Goals
------------------------

**Current State**: **Beta (Status 4)**  

The aim of Juham‚Ñ¢ is to have fun learning Python and the GitLab ecosystem while developing a home automation framework capable of controlling all devices in Juha's home, with the potential to be adapted for other homes as well.

In its current form, Juham‚Ñ¢ no longer stands for a ‚Äúmess,‚Äù though it isn‚Äôt quite a ‚Äúmasterpiece‚Äù yet either. Still working hard to turn it into a masterpiece!
